t: Brand Guidelines - Amazon Music for Artists
s: Here are the logo variations and guidelines you'll need to promote your music on Amazon Music.

t: Amazon Music for Artists - Amazon Music for Artists
s: Amazon Music for Artists is available on both web and mobile. Click here for web. On mobile, head to the Apple App Store or Google Play Store and download the Amazon Music for Artists app. Once the app is open, you will be directed to sign in using an Amazon retail account.

t: inMusic - Home of the world’s premier music industry brands
s: inMusic is the parent company for a family of premier brands that includes AIR Music Technology, Akai Professional, Alesis, Alto Professional, BFD, Denon DJ, Denon Professional, Engine DJ, HeadRush, ION Audio, M-Audio, Marantz Professional, MARQ, MixMeister, Numark, Rane, Sonivox, SoundSwitch, ...

s: Amazon Prime Music App available for android, IOS devices. Download Prime music on echo devices, fire TV, PC and enjoy the ad-free music at Amazon Prime Music store.

t: Amazon Music - Amazon Music for Artists
s: Anyone can listen to Amazon Music by downloading the free Amazon Music app, or by going to wherever you listen to music, including Alexa-enabled devices. Enjoy free streaming access to thousands of stations and top playlists, plus, check out your artist page anytime.

t: inMusic Brands - Wikipedia
s: September 10, 2024 - His company additionally acquired DJ software brand Mixmeister in 2007 and Alto Professional in 2010. Despite continuing to sell the product through Numark, development of MixMeister was subsequently abandoned with the last update being v7.7.1 in 2015. In February 2012 O’Donnell acquired software synthesizer company Sonivox, and in July of the same year, he acquired M-Audio and the AIR Software Group from Avid Technology, Inc. for $17 million. In April 2014, inMusic ...

t: Amazon Music Brand Lead — Camila De Vincenzo
s: Amazon Music’s brand needed refining after the product’s global growth in 2018. As brand lead I helped define guiding principles of the new style, working with leadership, vendors, partners, and the visual team.

t: Featured on Amazon Music - Amazon Music for Artists
s: Opportunities at Amazon Music (and beyond) give artists a place to grow their brand--while giving fans a chance to dive even deeper into their fave music.
